column1: Lengerich is a town in the district of Steinfurt
column3: Germany. It is situated on the southern slope of the Teutoburg Forest
column4: approx. 15 km south-west of Osnabrück and 30 km north-east of Münster.

column1: Lengerich is situated at the Wanne-Eickel-Hamburg railway and offers hourly connections to Münster and Osnabrück.
The mayor is the pharmacist Wilhelm Möhrke (independent)
